subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] New file uploaded to Read_Alphabet
msgSnippet: The font below is just a copy of the letters from the Jerome font, mapped to the QS-SAMPA proposal. It includes all 44 letters, 2 alternate letters, and 3
messageBody:
The font below is just a copy of the letters from the Jerome font,
mapped to the QS-SAMPA proposal. It includes all 44 letters, 2
alternate letters, and 3 punctuation marks. It does not include
ligatures or half-letters. I fiddled around with a few of the glyphs,
as the sharp-eyed will quickly see. I tried to address letter-spacing
to some extent, but it's far from perfect. This is just a concept
font. I'm happy to make corrections, so please send me your comments.
(My intention, though, is primarily to get back to work on my own
font.)

Since there are no ligatures, anyone using this font will have to type
each letter individually, and the resulting text can then be copied
and sent as plain-text QS-SAMPA.

Thanks.

Ted
